sidebar.title: Meetily
sidebar.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this meeting? This action cannot be undone.
sidebar.allDataRemoved: All associated data has been removed

recording.microphoneErrorMessage:
Unable to access your microphone. Please check that:
‚Ä¢ Your microphone is connected
‚Ä¢ The app has microphone permissions
‚Ä¢ No other app is using the microphone
recording.systemAudioErrorMessage:
Unable to capture system audio. Please check that:
‚Ä¢ A virtual audio device (like BlackHole) is installed
‚Ä¢ The app has screen recording permissions (macOS)
‚Ä¢ System audio is properly configured
recording.permissionErrorMessage:
Recording permissions are required. Please:
‚Ä¢ Grant microphone access in System Settings
‚Ä¢ Grant screen recording access for system audio (macOS)
‚Ä¢ Restart the app after granting permissions
recording.recordingFailedMessage: Unable to start recording. Please check your audio device settings and try again.

transcription.startRecordingPrompt: Start recording to see live transcription

summary.title: AI Enhanced Summary
summary.noSummaryDescription: Generate an AI-powered summary of your meeting transcript to get key points, action items, and decisions.
summary.selectModelFirst: Please select a model in Settings first
summary.errorCheckConfig: Please check your model configuration and API keys, or try again.
summary.creatingSummary: Creating a detailed summary of your meeting...

permissions.microphoneNeeded: Meetily needs access to your microphone to record meetings. No microphone devices were detected.
permissions.microphoneConnected: Your microphone is connected and powered on
permissions.microphonePermissionGranted: Microphone permission is granted in System Settings
permissions.noOtherAppUsing: No other app is exclusively using the microphone
permissions.systemAudioNotAvailableMessage: System audio capture is not available. You can still record with your microphone, but computer audio won't be captured.
permissions.systemAudioAlsoNotAvailable: System audio capture is also not available.
permissions.enableSystemAudioMacOS: To enable system audio on macOS:
permissions.installVirtualAudioDevice: Install a virtual audio device (e.g., BlackHole 2ch)
permissions.grantScreenRecording: Grant Screen Recording permission to Meetily
permissions.configureAudioRouting: Configure your audio routing in Audio MIDI Setup

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Enable or disable notifications of start and end of meeting

storage.title: Data Storage Locations
storage.description: View and access where Meetily stores your data
storage.note: Note: Database and models are stored together in your application data directory for unified management.

recording.title: Recording Settings
recording.description: Configure how your audio recordings are saved during meetings.
recording.saveAudioDescription: Automatically save audio files when recording stops
recording.fileFormatNote: Recordings are saved with timestamp: recording_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.{{format}}
recording.audioDisabled: Audio recording is disabled. Enable "Save Audio Recordings" to automatically save your meeting audio.
recording.recordingStartNotificationDesc: Show legal notice reminder to inform participants when recording starts (US law compliance)
recording.defaultAudioDevicesDesc: Set your preferred microphone and system audio devices for recording. These will be automatically selected when starting new recordings.

summarizationModel.title: Model Settings
summarizationModel.endpointDescription: Leave empty or enter a custom endpoint (e.g., http://x.yy.zz:11434)
summarizationModel.endpointChanged: Endpoint changed. Please click "Fetch Models" to load models from the new endpoint before saving.
summarizationModel.noModelsFound: No models found. Download a recommended model or click "Fetch Models" to load available Ollama models.
summarizationModel.endpointChangedClickFetch: Endpoint changed. Click "Fetch Models" to load models from the new endpoint.
summarizationModel.noModelsMatch: No models found matching "{{query}}". Try a different search term.
summarizationModel.autoGenerateDescription: Automatically generate summary when opening meetings without one
summarizationModel.summaryModelDescription: Configure the AI model used for generating meeting summaries.

language.title: Transcription Language
language.autoDetectWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Auto Detect may produce incorrect results
language.autoDetectMessage: For best accuracy, select your specific language (e.g., English, Spanish, etc.)
language.translationModeMessage: All audio will be automatically translated to English. Best for multilingual meetings where you need English output.
language.parakeetLimitation: Parakeet currently only supports automatic language detection. Manual language selection is not available. Use Whisper if you need to specify a particular language.

devices.title: Audio Devices
devices.microphoneInfo: ‚Ä¢ Microphone: Records your voice and ambient sound
devices.systemAudioInfo: ‚Ä¢ System Audio: Records computer audio (music, calls, etc.)
devices.micLevelsInfo: ‚Ä¢ Mic Levels: Green = good, Yellow = loud, Red = too loud
devices.testMicTip: ‚Ä¢ Tip: Click "Test Mic" to check if your microphone is working

analytics.title: Analytics Consent
analytics.description: Help us improve Meetily by sharing anonymous usage data
analytics.learnMore: Learn more about what data we collect
analytics.personalInfo: ‚Ä¢ No personal information or identifiable data
analytics.apiKeys: ‚Ä¢ No API keys or sensitive credentials
analytics.consent: Your privacy is important to us. This data helps us understand how users interact with Meetily and identify areas for improvement.
analytics.noData: No analytics data available for the selected period

interface.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application interface

devices.failedToLoad: Failed to load audio devices. Please check your system audio settings.

models.selectModel: Select a model to begin downloading

about.title: Meetily
about.tagline: Real-time notes and summaries that never leave your machine.
about.privacyDescription: Your data & AI processing workflow can now stay within your premise. No cloud, no leaks.
about.useAnyModelDescription: Prefer local open-source model? Great. Want to plug in an external API? Also fine. No lock-in.
about.costSmartDescription: Avoid pay-per-minute bills by running models locally (or pay only for the calls you choose).
about.worksEverywhereDescription: Google Meet, Zoom, Teams-online or offline.
about.comingSoonDescription: A library of on-device AI agents-automating follow-ups, action tracking, and more.
about.readyToPush: Ready to push your business further?
about.customSolution: If you're planning to build privacy-first custom AI agents or a fully tailored product for your business, we can help you build it.

meetingDetails.startRecordingToSee: Start a recording to see transcripts appear here
meetingDetails.customPromptPlaceholder: Add any specific instructions for the AI...

notifications.legalNoticeMessage: Remember to inform all participants that this meeting is being recorded, as required by law in many jurisdictions.
